doom.driver: White House presses Iran to make deal, while ramping up military presence. US media reports that Trump has discussed attack options with advisers, and a strike could happen as early as Saturday.
doom.blurb: SATURDAY STRIKE: IRAN ATTACK WINDOW OPENS
doom.summary: The Iran situation has escalated from carrier deployments to active strike planning, with reports suggesting military action could occur within 48 hours. Meanwhile, South Korea just sentenced its ex-president to life in prison for insurrection, former Prince Andrew got arrested over Epstein connections, and Trump's planning a 5,000-person military base in Gaza. It's a geopolitical pressure cooker with the Iran timer ticking loudest.

factors.name: Geopolitics
factors.detail: Iran strike reportedly planned for Saturday, carrier groups positioned, while Russia-Ukraine talks stall and Trump pursues Gaza militarization.

factors.name: Governance
factors.detail: South Korean president gets life sentence for insurrection, Peru ousts its eighth president in a decade, and Prince Andrew arrested—institutional instability across multiple regions.

factors.name: AI Capability
factors.detail: OpenAI's Osborne warns nations will become 'weaker and poorer' without AI adoption, Google launches music generation in Gemini, but no major capability jumps reported.

factors.name: Wild Card
factors.detail: Eight skiers dead in California avalanche, 53 migrants dead/missing in Mediterranean, 32 killed in Nigerian village raids—elevated baseline tragedy without systemic escalation.

factors.name: Alignment
factors.detail: DeepMind questions whether chatbots are virtue signaling rather than genuinely moral, but no acute alignment failures or concerning capability demonstrations.

dawn.driver: Shingles vaccine show surprising promise against Alzheimer's
dawn.summary: While headlines detail arrests and geopolitical tensions, a groundbreaking medical discovery offers hope to millions. Researchers found that a widely-available shingles vaccine shows significant promise in preventing Alzheimer's disease—transforming an existing, accessible treatment into a potential weapon against one of humanity's most feared conditions. This is the kind of breakthrough that changes lives quietly but profoundly.

factors.name: Science
factors.detail: Ancient DNA solves 12,000-year-old genetic mystery while ultra-fast pulsar discovered near Milky Way's black hole.

factors.name: Medicine
factors.detail: Shingles vaccine shows Alzheimer's prevention promise and DMT proves effective as antidepressant in clinical trials.

factors.name: Environment
factors.detail: New sodium-ion battery stores twice the energy while also desalinating seawater into drinking water.

factors.name: Technology
factors.detail: AI dramatically speeds hunt for next-gen magnetic materials to replace rare earth elements in electric vehicles.

factors.name: Human Spirit
factors.detail: 71-year-old dancer cast in Taylor Swift video proves you're never too old to achieve dreams.
